TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsToken extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示能识别的单词或短语。

span.span: Represents a word or short phrase that can be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类的成员 ，可以指定三种形式的单词： 窗体、 窗体和 word 的自定义 。Using the members of the class, you can specify three forms of a word: the form, the form, and a custom for the word. 如果有多个字词存储在一个 对象中，则每个单词在内部和结果中被视为不同的标记。If multiple words are stored in a single object, each is treated as a different token internally and in the result. 此类表示 `token` 万维网联合会 (W3C) [语音识别语法规范定义的元素 (SRGS) 版本 1.0.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `token` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 有关 SRGS 元素的信息 `token` 以及有关其对系统的支持的详细信息，请参阅 [标记元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632)。For information about the SRGS `token` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [token Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并指定要识别的文本。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个 对象，该对象的 属性最初设置为参数的值 `text` 。Creates a object whose property is set initially to the value of the `text` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置需朗读的文本的显示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display form of the text to be spoken.

value.span: 标记应显示的表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the token as it should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常表示相同的值，但 窗体可能不同于 中某个词或短语的形式 。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，显示窗体可能是一个缩写词，如 "USA"，而要朗读的文本和应用的文本 为 "北美洲的美国"。For example, the display form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置应朗读的单词的书写形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the written form of the word that should be spoken.

value.span: 在 类别实例中包含的文本。

span.span: The text contained within the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常表示相同的值，但 窗体可能不同于 中某个词或短语的形式 。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如， 窗体可能是一个缩写词，如 "USA"，而要朗读的文本和应用的文本 为 "北美洲的美国"。For example, the form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America". 属性的默认值 为空字符串-""。The default value for the property is an empty string - "".

exception.span: 试图将 指定为空字符串。
